org.epics.ioc.support.alarm
Interface AlarmSupport

All Superinterfaces:
org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester, Support
public interface AlarmSupport
extends Support

Support for alarm field. All methods must be called with the record locked.

Author:
mrk

          Called at the beginning of record processing.

          Called at the end of record processing.

Method Detail

beginProcess

void beginProcess()
Called at the beginning of record processing. The alarm in the record is called by recordProcess. Alarm fields in subfields of the record are called by alarmSupport.

endProcess

void endProcess()
Called at the end of record processing.

setAlarm

boolean setAlarm(java.lang.String message,
                 org.epics.pvData.property.AlarmSeverity severity)
Attempt to set a new alarm. The request is satisfied if the new alarm has higher priority than the current priority.

Parameters:
message - The message.
severity - The severity for the message.
Returns:
(false,true) if the request (was not, was) successful.

getAlarm

org.epics.pvData.property.Alarm getAlarm()
Get the Alarm interface, which is defined in org.epics.pvData.property.

Returns:
The interface.
